 @CacheConfig(cacheNames="library-cache")
public class LibraryController
extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • getLibraries

        @Cacheable(key="#root.methodName + \'(\' + #root.args + \')\'",
           unless="!#result.success")
 @GetMapping(value="/libraries")
public Result getLibraries(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                                                                  Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                  Integer pn,
                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                  Integer ps,
                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                  String biliPlatform,
                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                  Integer type,
                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                                                  int platform)
        Get all libraries with platform.
        Parameters:
        id - Your user id in pms, used for cache evicting.
        pn - The page number, only used in bilibili.
        ps - The page size, only used in bilibili.
        biliPlatform - The platform of bilibili, default is web, only used in bilibili.
        type - The fav lists type of bilibili, 0 means get created fav lists, 1 means get collected fav lists, only used in bilibili.
        platform - Which platform the user belongs to. 0 represents pms, 1 represents qq music, 2 represents netease cloud music, 3 represents bilibili.
        Returns:
        All libraries for specific platform.
        API Note:
        GET /libraries?id=id&platform=platform

      • createLibrary

        @PostMapping(value="/library")
public Result createLibrary(@RequestBody
                                                           Map<String,String> library,
                                                           @RequestParam
                                                           int platform)
        Create new library in platform.
        Parameters:
        library - A map that contains the name of library.
        platform - Which platform the library belongs to.
        Returns:
        The response of request wrapped by Result DTO.
        API Note:
        POST /library?platform=platform {"name"(required): "name", "intro":intro, "privacy":privacy, "cover":cover}

      • updateLibrary

        @PutMapping(value="/library")
public Result updateLibrary(@ModelAttribute
                                                          UpdateLibraryDTO library,
                                                          @RequestParam
                                                          int platform)
        Update library in platform.
        Parameters:
        library - A map contains fields to update.
        platform - Which platform the library belongs to.
        Returns:
        The response of request wrapped by Result DTO.
        API Note:
        PUT /library?platform=platform {"name"(required):name, "intro":intro, "cover":cover} (PMSDetailLibrary)

      • getDetailLibrary

        @Cacheable(key="#root.methodName + \'(\' + #root.args + \')\'",
           unless="!#result.success")
 @GetMapping(value="/library/{library}")
public Result getDetailLibrary(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                              String library,
                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                              Integer pn,
                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                              Integer ps,
                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                              String keyword,
                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                              String order,
                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                              Integer range,
                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                              Integer type,
                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                                                              int platform)
        Get detail library with library.
        Parameters:
        library - The library id.
        pn - The page number of library, required in bilibili.
        ps - The page size of library, required in bilibili.
        keyword - The searching keyword of resources in fav list, only used in bilibili.
        order - The sorting order of resources of this fav list, mtime: by collected time, view: by view time, pubtime: by published time, only used in bilibili.
        range - The range of searching, 0: current fav list, 1: all fav lists, only used in bilibili.
        type - 0 for created fav list, 1 for collected fav list, required in bilibili.
        platform - Which platform the user belongs to.
        Returns:
        Detail library.
        API Note:
        GET /library/library?platform=platform

      • deleteLibrary

        @DeleteMapping(value="/library/{libraryId}")
public Result deleteLibrary(@PathVariable
                                                                         String libraryId,
                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                         int platform)
        Delete the library in platform.
        Parameters:
        libraryId - The id of library, multiple libraries separated with comma.
        platform - Which platform the library belongs to.
        Returns:
        The response of request wrapped by Result DTO.
        API Note:
        DELETE /library/libraryId?platform=platform

      • addSongsToLibrary

        @PostMapping(value="/addSongsToLibrary")
public Result addSongsToLibrary(@RequestBody
                                                                         Map<String,Object> requestBody,
                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                         int platform)
        Add songs songsId to library libraryId in platform platform, tid is used to evict cache.
        Parameters:
        requestBody - A map that contains songs id and target library's id.
        platform - Which platform the library belongs to.
        Returns:
        The response of request wrapped by Result DTO.
        API Note:
        POST /addSongsToLibrary?platform=platform {"libraryId":"libraryId","songsId":"songsId","tid":"tid"}, in bilibili, still need biliSourceFavListId and isFavoriteSearchedResource field, biliSourceFavListId for add resources that already in fav list to other fav lists, isFavoriteSearchedResource for add searched resource to fav list; If add songs to pms library, still need songs field and isAddToPMSLibrary set to true; If add bilibili resources, still need resources field and isAddToPMSLibrary set to true.

      • moveSongsToOtherLibrary

        @PutMapping(value="/moveSongsToOtherLibrary")
public Result moveSongsToOtherLibrary(@RequestBody
                                                                                    Map<String,String> requestBody,
                                                                                    @RequestParam
                                                                                    int platform)
        Move songs songsId from source library with fromLibrary to target library with toLibrary.
        Parameters:
        requestBody - A map that contains parameters, fromTid and toTid are used to evict cache.
        platform - Which platform the library belongs to.
        Returns:
        The response of request wrapped by Result DTO.
        API Note:
        PUT /moveSongsToOtherLibrary?platform=platform {"songsId":"songsId","fromLibrary":"fromLibrary","toLibrary":"toLibrary","fromTid":"fromTid","toTid":"toTid"}

      • removeSongsFromLibrary

        @DeleteMapping(value="/removeSongsFromLibrary")
public Result removeSongsFromLibrary(@RequestParam
                                                                                     String libraryId,
                                                                                     @RequestParam
                                                                                     String songsId,
                                                                                     @RequestParam
                                                                                     String tid,
                                                                                     @RequestParam
                                                                                     int platform)
        Remove songs songsId from library with libraryId in platform platform.
        Parameters:
        libraryId - The id of library.
        songsId - The id of songs, multiple songs id separated with comma.
        platform - Which platform the library belongs to.
        tid - The tid of library, used to evict cache.
        Returns:
        The response of request wrapped by Result DTO.
        API Note:
        DELETE /removeSongsFromLibrary?libraryId=libraryId&songsId=songsId&platform=platform&tid=tid
